name.namePart: (AUTestingRecords2) Scholix Source Collection With a Single Identifier, CitationMetadata with contributor with multiple nameParts, relatedInfo isOwnedBy creator, reverse relatedInfo hasCollector creator and Single reverse relatedObject collection/publication.

collection.description: Expected Result: 1 Link Info Package with a link from the collection doi identifier to the publication uri identifier. Source publication date, creator and identifier shall be taken from citationMetadata. CitationMetadata Creator name is display name for contributor (all nameParts Firstname, Surname) 2nd creator taken from relatedInfo isOwnedBy party. 3rd creator taken from reverse relatedInfo isCollectorOf party.

citationMetadata.title: (citation/title) Scholix Source Collection With a Single Identifier, CitationMetadata with contributor with multiple nameParts, relatedInfo isOwnedBy creator, reverse relatedInfo hasCollector creator and Single reverse relatedObject collection/publication.
